mapper.select: select job_type, count(*) as count from wedpr_job_table wjt group by job_type
select owner_agency, count(*) as count from wedpr_job_table wjt where wjt.owner_agency = #{agencyName} group by owner_agency

WITH RECURSIVE DateRange AS ( SELECT #{startTime} AS `create_time` UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(`create_time`, INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM DateRange WHERE DATEDIFF(create_time, #{endTime}) < 0 ) SELECT DR.`create_time`, COALESCE(COUNT(WJ.`id`), 0) AS `count` FROM DateRange DR LEFT JOIN `wedpr_job_table` WJ ON DATE(WJ.`create_time`) = DR.`create_time` AND WJ.`job_type` = #{jobType} GROUP BY DR.`create_time` ORDER BY DR.`create_time`
